data.title: This gal knows how to get deep in your muscle
data.text:
I loved this lady and studio!! Booked a 90min massage. Wonderful essential oil where you lay and heated massage table. Also wonderful relaxing music in the background. She assesses you for about 20minutes and then works deep into your muscle tissue. She made me feel so comfortable!! She found all my stressed spots for sure and then more. Why do I always have to find the best masseuses on vacation? Oh well I'm not complaining !!!! So happy I chose her (Amanda)
-Sheri from the FL keys 😘

data.title: Want a great massage?
data.text: Amanda is the best massage therapist I have ever been to. She tailors each massage to the client and I always leave there feeling great. Next time you are needing a massage, call her. You won't be disappointed.

data.title: This beautiful lady is the best yoga instructor and massage therapist!!! I strongly recommend!
data.text: I love the style of yoga Amanda has and the way she can verbally take your mind on a meditational journey, while stretching your body, too.  She is also one of the best massage therapists I know and uses her knowledge of anatomy to help the client attain a healthier, happier life through fascial manipulation and sports massage integration.  No matter your ailment... She will help in a loving, professional, and spiritual way.
